newsitem.title: UK: UK Treasury sees stronger growth 2nd half of 96.
newsitem.headline: UK Treasury sees stronger growth 2nd half of 96.

text.p: The UK Treasury said it expected stronger growth in the second half of 1996.
"Growth in the second quarter was held back in the second quarter by stocks...stock changes should wear off in the second half of the year and we expect stronger growth," a spokesman said.
UK Q2 GDP UP UNREVISED +0.4% QQ +1.8% YY, EX-OIL,GAS +0.3% QQ +1.7% YY
